title: Kept me going
review: This movie was interesting and it kept me on the edge of my seat. Acting was great all around. Definitely give it a try.

title: Boring
review: Saw it in imax and it was boring. Acting wasn't there. Movie was going super slow. No idea how they claim it to be the best movie of the year. It was cool learning more about the story however I wanted this movie to end very soon Into it.

title: Overrated.
review: Cute I'll give it that. But the plot was something that I've seen too much. Really nothing special.
